title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6654.7 - OAA providers' maintenance of effort
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6654.7 - OAA providers' maintenance of effort

State Regulations

Each OAA provider must: (a) ensure that OAA funds are not used to
replace funds from nonfederal sources; and
(b) agree to continue or initiate efforts to
obtain support from private and other public sources for services funded
through OAA. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6654.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
